lines: 1. Wuonwa, wabironi,konyruok waongegoIn e kar konyruokwa,wasayoi;Kwapogore kodi,to waneno chandruok;Wuonwa, mond` ihowa,ka ma wantie.
Wuonwa wabironi,wan to wanyapKik iwewa kendwaWuonwa, winjwa.
2. Ritwa kuom wasikwa,ritwa e chandruokwaWarwa e masiche,kwaluongoi.Chunywa ochandore,wadwaro tekoniWakwayoi chutho,miwa teko.
3. Ng`wononi imiwa,wabed magi chutho,Chunywa mond` iriti,ka wan e wuoth.Telnwa, wakwayoi,nyaka watiek wuodhwaNyaka wadonj polomar dak kodi
